title: == sync, corrected by elderman == @elder_man
subtitle: The Republican Party candidate Mike Pines presided over the organization which published an article on gay men who were not fit for military service, but did not write the article himself.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: (Indiana Goff) Mike Pines said gays aren't "like a physically capable group" and "they're known to have very high rates of disease because of the nature of their sexual practices."
